GameObstacles Class Reference

GameObstacles class is the class handling the creation of the obstacle(tanks) at random positions in the world instatiated initially through the gamemodel factory inherting GameModel. More...

Detailed Description

GameObstacles class is the class handling the creation of the obstacle(tanks) at random positions in the world instatiated initially through the gamemodel factory inherting GameModel.
